[LEXICON]: Overly formal vocabulary may impede readability for non-specialist audiences.

[STRUCTURE]: Subtle lack of explicit transitional phrases between paragraphs, though logical flow is maintained.

[COMPLEXITY]: Overly complex sentence structures may impede smooth reading flow for some readers.

[TRANSITION]: Slight abruptness in shifting from spiritual trends to materialism critique;
[CLARITY]: Peripheral quotes (e.g., Bahá'u'lláh) lack explicit contextual integration.
